job.title: Java Software Engineer (EE Knowledge A MUST!)
job.description: If you are a Java Software Engineer EE Knowledge A MUST with 3 years of INDUSTRY experience please read onltbrgtltbrgtBased in the hustle and bustle of some of the nations emerging markets is a renewables Hardware and Software company building out their office in Herndon VA We are a green tech company that has been around for 100 years and is seeking to tackle energy storage We have partnered with leading professionals in the Renewables space and are starting to grow a great deal in our Software divisionltbrgtltbrgtFor the Softare division we are looking for top professionals to help us on our next project We are building software to make datadriven decisions in the Green Tech space These Engineers will be building software that will directly impact the scale
